text: Koraa, ‘he kitabisakala! Aha se'i kathara pine yito amara arau tomalokara majata mila ache; seya haiche- ami yena ekamatra allahara bahirae ana karao ibadata nakarao, te'omra lagata ana kako ansi sthapana nakarao arau amara majara konorae yate ijane sijanaka raba hicape grahana nakarae’. Tathapi'o yadi sihamte mukha ghuraa'i laya, teneha’le tomaloke koraa, ‘tomaloke saksi thaka ye, niscaya ami muchalima’
